text: Schneider's Anti-Noise Crusade is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithSCHNEIDER'S ANTI-NOISE CRUSADEDean W. Duncan. Stories of Childhood: Evolving Portrayals in Books and Films and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Anita Hendrie. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Schneider * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Schneider * Anita Hendrie as Lena, Mr. Schneider's sister * Arthur V. Johnson as violinist * Jeanie MacPherson as maid * Owen Moore as first thief * Herbert Prior as second thief * Tony O'Sullivan in unverified role * Clara T. Bracy as extra * Flora French as extra * Mack Sennett as extra ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Schneider's Anti-Noise Crusade
